title: Monochroma.PROPER-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:



Monochroma PROPER



Release Date: 5/2014 Protection: Steam

Discs: 1 Genre: Platform



Monochroma is a cinematic puzzle platformer. It's a game about being

a kid, growing up with a little brother that needs your help, facing

obstacles, and solving unique puzzles in a dystopian 1950's setting



Extract

Burn or mount the .iso

Run setup.exe and install to your desired location

Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir

Play



PROPER Notes:

The FLT release crashes right on game start



Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go

online



CODEX is currently looking for:



nothing but competition!



are you ready?



LNK^CPS 02/2014
